All Classes

Class Description
AuthenticationFilter
Basic Authentication Filter for REST API.
CategoriesRestServlet
Returns all categories via REST API.
JsonHelper
Helper methods for reading and writing JSON data.
LoginServlet
User login.
LogoutServlet
Resets a user session.
RegisterServlet
Registers a new user.
Todo
The Todo class implements a Todo
TodoListServlet
A servlet for reading, filtering and deleting multiple todo items.
TodoServlet
A servlet for reading and manipulation single todo items.
TodosRestServlet
Read and manipulate todo items via REST API.
User
The User class implements a user with his set of Todos.
UserException
The exception UserException is thrown when registering or authenticating a user has failed.
UserManager
The User Manager is responsible for the registration and authentication of a user.
UsersRestServlet
Register a user via REST API.
XmlHelper
Helper methods for reading and writing XML data.
